channel.title: VPS CentOS error
channel.description:
[CODE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) . Program will exit.ain class: server.Server [/CODE]
When I run the run.bat file this comes up. Im not sure how to fix this. I would really appreciate the help if anyone knows.
I followed this guide [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html[/url]

item.title: VPS CentOS error
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You must compile your server again.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS CentOS error
item.dc:creator: @omfgamrange omfgamrange
item.description:
@omfgamrange wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) . Program will exit.ain class: server.Server

When I run the run.bat file this comes up.
Im not sure how to fix this. I would really appreciate the help if anyone knows.

I followed this guide
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html
